import './ExpenseItem.css' function ExpenseItem(props) { const month = props.date.toLocaleString('en-US', { month: "long" }) const day = props.date.toLocaleString('en-US',{day:'2-digit'}) return ( <>
{month}
{year}
{day}

{props.title}

{props.amount} PLN
) } export default ExpenseItem
